From: 
aNIMIE> 
To: ' (USANYS)" 
Subject: FW: SDNY COIVD Screening Forms for next week 
Date: Fri, 13 Aug 2021 21:54:29 +0000 
Attachments: _Fact_Witness_Travel_Request.docx 
Hi=, 
Please see below. Would you be able to send the hotel confirmation for please? I'm reattaching the 
travel request for reference. You sent me his flight confirmation, but did not include a hotel. 
Thanks 
 Original Message 
From: Giffuni, Danielle ..t> 
Sent: Friday, August 13, 2021 5:53 PM 
To: 
Cc: McGorty, Glen 
; 
Zelenko, 
Daniel alMIUMII 
(USANYS) 
Subject: Re: SDNY COIVD Screening Forms for next week 
has not received confirmation of his hotel or the location. Can you advise? Thanks. 
Best, 
Danielle 
Sent from my iPhone 
On 
Aug 13, 2021, at 5:27 PM, 
External Email 
2pm is fine on our end, thanks very much. See you 
then. 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1  St. Andrew's Plaza 
N wY rk NY 1 
From: McGorty, 
Glen all> 
Sent: Friday, August 13, 2021 5:08 PM 
wrote: 
EFTA00031450

Zelenko, Daniel 
S; 
Subject: RE: SDNY COIVD Screening Forms for next week 
Danielle and I are going to be covering Monday's in-person meeting with Mr. and we look forward to 
seeing everyone. On scheduling, I've had a few other commitments come up which make 1 p.m. challenging. 
Would a 2 p.m. start work on your end? Please let me know. 
Best, 
Glen 
Glen G. McGorty I 
Crowell & Moring LLP 
Managing Partner, New York Office 
590 Madison Avenue 120th Floor I  New York, NY 10022-2524

Subject: SDNY COIVD Screening Forms for next week 
External Email 
Hi all, 
In advance of our meeting(s) with Mr. at 1  St. Andrews, we'll need to ask everyone who is attending, 
including your client, to please fill out the attached form. Would you please send me the completed forms in 
advance of our meeting? 
Thanks 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1  St. Andrew's Plaza 
10007
